title: Bug 21834 Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. As a result, the entire second row is removed from the layout.
EB: Press the Delete button. This should only delete the first item on the second row and keep the second row intact.
SR:
1. Press the Delete button to delete the first item on the second row. 
2. Observe that the second row remains in the layout after the delete operation.
